price: 78. Gezegend is de naam van jullie Heer (Allah) de Eigenaar van majesteit en eer.
arabic: تَبَٰرَكَ ٱسۡمُ رَبِّكَ ذِي ٱلۡجَلَٰلِ وَٱلۡإِكۡرَامِ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: tabāraka us'mu rabbika dhī al-jalāli wal-ik'rāmi
